metadata.title: CVE-2023-4070 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Type Confusion in V8 in Google Chrome prior to 115.0.5790.170 allowed aremote attacker to perform arbitrary read/write via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
